H0.text: who was the father of the princes in the tower. Richard III

H1.text: who was the father of the princes in the tower. George, Duke of Clarence

H2.text: who was the father of the princes in the tower. Richard, Duke of York

H3.text: who was the father of the princes in the tower. Edward IV

A4.text: Richard, Duke of York (17 August 1473 – c. 1483); one of the Princes in the Tower

A5.text: Edward IV's eldest son, also named Edward, was made Prince of Wales when he was seven months old and given his own household at the age of three.
